img_above_text:
## Black Myth: Wukong Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook Location
The Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook is located in the Village of Lanxi in The Webbed Hollow. Upon defeating The Second Sister and waking up underground, it can be found in a chest.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character exploring a dark, web-filled underground area. A chest, highlighted with a red circle, is visible in the distance, indicating the location of the Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook mentioned in the preceding text. The right side of the screen displays recently acquired items: Antimiasma Powder and Longevity Decoction. This image serves as a visual guide to help players locate the chest containing the item in *The Webbed Hollow*.
